abstract: The bank said it was streamlining its operations there so it could place greater emphasis on its corporate arm, which is larger and more profitable.
snippet: The bank said it was streamlining its operations there so it could place greater emphasis on its corporate arm, which is larger and more profitable.
lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES — Citigroup announced on Friday that it would sell its retail businesses in Argentina, Brazil and Colombia, countries in which it has been trading for more than a century.

headline.main: Citigroup to Sell Retail Units in Argentina, Brazil and Colombia
